text:
Здравейте,

 

Моля, за вашето съдействие спешно в рамките на днешния ден да се захрани сметката на Тибиел в Гърция с 200 Евро.

 

С най-добри пожелания,

Елена Ковачки

 

Ръководител „Администрация и Бек Офис“

Отдел „Търговия с природен газ“

Моб: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/> 

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД



 



 

From: Kotsiou Eirini <EKotsiou@eurobank.gr> 
Sent: Friday, September 20, 2024 10:42 AM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>; Office <office@tibiel.com>; OfficeGR <officegr@tibiel.com>; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>
Cc: Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr>; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr>
Subject: RE: TIBIEL Ltd Natural Gas Platform trd limit 19/9/2024

 

Dear all,

 

I would like to inform you that today your total settlement amount is Debit  200,00 €

This amount is not available to your bank account, please for your immediate actions.

 

 

Best regards

Eirini Kotsiou
Head of General Member Clearing Services

 

Group Investment Products Operations 
Group Central Services & Operations 

 



 

EUROBANK S.A.
Panagouli & Siniosoglou Str. (Building E)

 

142 34 Nea Ionia, Athens 
t. +30 214 40 46 724 (46724)
